Commit: deb4d04

Refines turn expiration logic to avoid false positives with `turnExpiresAt` checks and stabilizes smoke tests with added timeout-strike observer validation workflows.

updates.title: Resolve timeout-strike handling for round progression
updates.content:
Resolve timeout-strike handling for round progression

Commit: 4a7662f

Refine timeout policy with `MULTIPLAYER_TURN_TIMEOUT_STAND_STRIKE_LIMIT`, introducing auto-stand to observer mode after repeated timeouts in the same round. Amend related game state synchronization and UI notifications to support forced observer transitions on timeout strikes.

updates.title: Fix smoke test room overflow handling and stabilize room join checks
updates.content:
Fix smoke test room overflow handling and stabilize room join checks

Commit: b191a4a

Resolves bugfix for improved room overflow polling with new constants `roomOverflowWaitMs` and `roomOverflowPollIntervalMs`. Refactors slot availability logic into reusable helper functions.
